com.lachman.passbook.model

Class PassbookModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lachman.passbook.model.PassbookModel

  • public class PassbookModel
extends Object
    Model class of the application It allows ciphering and deciphering password data to and from files. It uses the DESede encryption algorithm
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alicja Lachman

                                   InvalidKeySpecException,

                                   NoSuchPaddingException
        Method returning decrypted password.

        password - password to be decrypted
        encryptionKey - key used for encryption
